prompt:
I'm analyzing style requirements for a scientific paper for journal Computers (ISSN: 2073-431X).
            Extract ONLY the 3 most critical style requirements in each category.
            
            Journal Information Excerpt:
            
            
            Citation Style:
            IEEE style (abbreviated journals, Last, F.I. author format)
            
            Sample Paper Title and Abstract:
            Unknown Title
            Citation: Taherdoost, H.;
Madanchian, M. Artiﬁcial
Intelligence and Knowledge
Management: Impacts, Beneﬁts, and
Implementation. Computers 2023, 12,
72. https://doi.org/10.3390/
computers12040072
Academic Editors: Phivos Mylonas,
Katia Lida Kermanidis
            
            Provide a BRIEF style guide with ONLY:
            1. Top 3 formatting requirements (most important)
            2. Standard section structure (list of section names only)
            3. Citation style (brief description)
            
            Format as JSON with only these three fields.
system_prompt: You are a scientific journal style analysis assistant. Extract only the essential style guidelines.
response:
{
    "formatting_requirements": [
        "Title should be concise and informative, using title case",
        "Author names in Last, F.I. format with semicolon separation",
        "DOI must be included and properly formatted with https://doi.org/"
    ],
    "standard_sections": [
        "Title",
        "Abstract",
        "Introduction",
        "Materials and Methods",
        "Results",
        "Discussion",
        "Conclusions",
        "References"
    ],
    "citation_style": {
        "format": "IEEE style",
        "key_rules": [
            "Use numbered citations in square brackets [1]",
            "Abbreviated journal names",
            "Author format: Last, F.I."
        ]
    }
}{
    "formatting_requirements": [
